org.forgerock.openidm.policy

Class PolicyService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openidm.script.AbstractScriptedService
      • org.forgerock.openidm.policy.PolicyService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.forgerock.openidm.script.ScriptCustomizer, org.forgerock.script.ScriptListener

    @Properties(value={@Property(name="service.vendor",value="ForgeRock AS."),@Property(name="service.description",value="OpenIDM Policy Service"),@Property(name="openidm.router.prefix",value="/policy*")})
public class PolicyService
extends org.forgerock.openidm.script.AbstractScriptedService
    A Policy Service for policy validation.
